name: I Love Finding Wild Friends
description:
I Love Finding Wild Friends! is our recent addition to our "I Love Finding Franchise".

Explore to adopt and collect diverse wild animals! Enjoy new mini-games, crack engaging puzzles, and gather an array of exotic creatures!



Features

  • Discover diverse wild animals!
  • Search stunning hidden object landscapes.
  • Enjoy 20+ captivating mini-games!
  • Collect and adopt a menagerie of exotic creatures!

Collector’s Edition

  • 6 bonus habitats.
  • 12 extra mini-games.
  • Exclusive wallpapers.
  • A music player.
  • Rare wild animals eager to meet you!
  • Meet the developers' pets!

Discover lovable wild animals in this thrilling hidden object game!
